name: 4-Energy Auditing
content:
Energy Auditing Framework (Feeder → DTR → Consumer)


Ideal Principle (No Technical/Commercial Loss):

Energy at Feeder  

  = ∑ Energy at DTRs (connected to that Feeder)  

  = ∑ Energy at Consumers (connected to those DTRs)


Auditing Steps:


✅ Step 1: Feeder-Level Energy Aggregation

  • Extract monthly or weekly energy readings from Feeder meters.
  • Normalize for meter resets or missing data.


✅ Step 2: Sum Energy at Connected DTRs

  • Use finalized Feeder-to-DTR mapping.
  • Aggregate energy data for all DTRs under each feeder.
  • Compare with Feeder readings → Δ indicates technical loss at 11kV level.


✅ Step 3: Sum Energy at Connected Consumers

  • Use finalized DTR-to-Consumer mapping.
  • Aggregate monthly energy from all consumers under each DTR.
  • Compare with DTR readings → Δ indicates low-voltage technical + commercial losses.


Output:

  • Energy Balance Sheets per feeder:
  • Total Received at Feeder
  • Total Distributed to DTRs
  • Total Billed to Consumers
  • Loss Calculations:
  • Feeder to DTR Loss (%)
  • DTR to Consumer Loss (%)
